item.title: Little stones on cycle track, 8th June
item.description:
There is a load of little tarmac stone residue pebbles on the cycle track running parallel to A206 from Iron Mill lane to Perry street. These little pebbles are sharp and could damage bicycles, cars and also mothers pushing their babies on the pedestrian track which runs alongside the cycle track. This problem has been there at least six months, and it is strange this has not been cleaned by now Please support this plight to get the cycle track clean and kept safe. Thankyou !

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thames Road, Barnes Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On 25/04/25 at 18:54pm To whom it concerns. I would like to report 3 of duty police officers who are based at homerton hospital headquarters department near the ambulance A&E arrivals. 3 of duty officer smoking cigarettes/ e-cigarettes at the back of the police station fire escape door. There is clear signage on homerton hospital walls stating it is illegal to smoke on NHS grounds. Which offices ignored and carried on smoking. The hospital is for sick and unwell people this should not be tolerated by those who are supposed to uphold the law and serve their communities. If the local sergeant Terry could please address these issues and also the local authority., 8th June
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
